id: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm_DSThietBiPTTC

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    vkm.id, 
    vkm.ten, 
    dv.ten_don_vi, 
    vkm.mo_ta 
FROM 
    public.vu_khi_mang AS vkm
JOIN 
    public.don_vi AS dv ON vkm.don_vi_id = dv.id
WHERE
    1=1
    {{ ChartPTTC.selectedDataPoint ? `AND vkm.loai_vu_khi = '${ChartPTTC.selectedDataPoint.rawEventData.name}'` : '' }}

unpublishedAction.name: DSThietBiPTTC
unpublishedAction.pageId: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm
